hooks.command: FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then case "$FILE" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json|*.css) cd webapp && npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true;; esac; fi
FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FILE" ]; then case "$FILE" in *.go) gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true;; esac; fi
